Html:
I've created a patch to be able to do Client Certificate authentication, if needed. You can get it here: http://jasmanseblog.blogspot.com/2010/07/webservice-studio-202-patch.html

If any of the assigned people are reading this, please apply it to the source tree.

I've just opened alternate project on http://code.google.com/p/webservicestudio2/ and added your part of code and other improvements.

Please take a look and feel free to join the project.
